data.title: 1:1 iPad Air Program Overview
data.text:
Find out more! Equip your student with a state-of-the-art, multi-media computer for school. Order the iPad Air 6th gen, Apple Pencil Pro and a keyboard case!

A comprehensive overview of the leasing program with pricing details and information on why Apple, why the iPad Air and how this device can change the way our students are learning.

Click above for answers to some of the most commonly asked questions.

For example:

What if our family does not choose to participate in the lease-to-own?

We encourage every family to invest in the iPad Air package. We recognize that some families may already have invested in a device. There are three options for students:

Participate in the Lease-to-Own Program

Bring your own device (devices will not be supported by NPS tech and must meet certain requirements)

Use a loaner device in class as needed. Every classroom will have iPad devices available for student use. There will NOT be computers available for check out overnight, only for in-class use.

Will NHS have loaner devices for students to borrow for the day or overnight?

No, students will need to have their own device at home. See options above.

Take a look at the new iPad Air with the M2 chip. This fast processing device has the functionality of a laptop and the flexibility and creativity of a tablet.

From annotation and note taking to multimedia creation, the iPad Air 6th generation with Apple Pencil Pro and Logitech keyboard allows students to mark up readings, create multimedia projects, and manage all their school work on one, accessible device.
